testcase.name: Validate Credit Card Payments via a SEW CSO Pulse Front End - Incorrect Card Type
testcase.system-out: Given I open a browser and after I max window I navigate to SF homepage.....passed When I enter my credentials and login to the page...........................passed Then I click on the Gear icon and open the setup page.......................passed And I click on the Search and search for Frank Murray.......................passed And I click on the login button on setup user page for Frank Murray.........passed And I try fo find billing acount 1042163....................................passed And I Delete the unnecessary cookies........................................passed And I reload the page.......................................................passed And I click on CCPaument button for Frank Murray............................passed And I click on Credit Card Type and select Master for AARON P CROSS for negative scenario.passed And I enter credit card number for AARON P CROSS for negative scenario......passed And I set the Expiry Date for negative scenario.............................passed And I set the customer name for negative scenario...........................passed And I set the CVV for negative scenario.....................................passed And I set the Amount for negative scenario..................................passed And I enter on Submit to submit the payment form for negative scenario......passed And I take an screenshot of the not successful payment page.................passed
